title: The Sweetest Swing in Baseball
description: Dana's the toast of the art world - a hot property. So when her work hits a crisis she goes into decline. Holed up in a psychiatric hospital, she's looking for help. It comes, not from her insurance company, but from some unlikely friends and the inspirational swing of baseball legend Darryl Strawberry.The Sweetest Swing in Baseball received its world premi√®re at the Royal Court Theatre, London in March 2004.
author: Rebecca Gilman
